titles.title: INFRA Transparency Act
To amend title 23, United States Code, to modify the reporting requirement for the nationally significant freight and highway projects program, and for other purposes.
INFRA Transparency Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
INFRA Transparency Act
This bill modifies annual reporting requirements for the the nationally significant freight and highway projects program, including to require the Department of Transportation to provide a summary of each project for which an application was submitted and a grant was not provided.
